verbs.description: " The things that [V: are] happening in our country are so bad and it comes from Trump . "
" [ARG1: The things] [R-ARG1: that] are [V: happening] [ARGM-LOC: in our country] are so bad and it comes from Trump . "
" [ARG1: The things that are happening in our country] [V: are] [ARG2: so bad] and it comes from Trump . "
" The things that are happening in our country are so bad and [ARG1: it] [V: comes] [ARG2: from Trump] . "
